headline: Block, Inc. Surpasses $200 Billion in Credit Provided to Customers, Continuing to Address Global Lending Gaps
summary: DISTRIBUTED-WORK-MODEL/OAKLAND, Calif., January 20, 2026--Block, Inc. (NYSE: XYZ) today announced it has provided access to more than $200 billion to customers in global lending across its portfolio of credit products, including Cash App Borrow, Afterpay, and Square Loans.1 Through this work, Block is proving that with the right technology, inclusive lending and responsible risk management aren't opposing forces; rather, they're the foundation of sustainable credit for the next generation. headline: Ethereum leads way as large cryptocurrencies decrease

headline: Afterpay tallies BNPL repayments
summary: Most Afterpay customers have repaid their Black Friday and Cyber Monday purchases, the company said, pushing back on consumer “debt spiral” concerns.
